name: FlipPix Jigsaw - Small World
description:
An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Jigsaw! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of familiar landmarks. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

FlipPix Jigsaw provides a new twist to FlipPix Art puzzles. Each of the individual puzzles forms a piece of a larger picture. After the puzzles are solved, the pieces of the picture must then be rearranged to form the final image.

FlipPix Jigsaw - Small World contains 15 images from the insect world and has 83 puzzles in three sizes for a total of 249 puzzles, ranging from very easy to quite challenging levels of play.

FlipPix Jigsaw is designed specifically for tablet devices and incorporates a type of logic puzzle often referred to as a nonogram or griddler.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
